item.title: REPowerEU: Expanding Europe's financial capacity post-pandemic
item.description: Rosalba Fam√†, PhD student in EU law, Bocconi University Photo credit: ThibaultC, via wikicommons media In response to the energy crisis stemming from the Russian invasion of Ukraine, the European Union is implementing REPowerEU. Presented in May 2022, the comprehensive REPowerEU strategy encompasses proposals to modify existing energy directives and an ambitious industrial policy program aimed at achieving energy independence. This analysis will focus on the latter, referred to as the REPowerEU plan.
